entry.title: Basic Cooking
entry.content: How Jacques Pepin is teaching basic cooking to the fast-food generation

entry.title: Onion and potato pakodas
entry.summary: Well, its a basic recipie and any amateur cooks knows how to make it in their own way. Here I am sharing my own ways and some tricks, the way I like it. You can make the adjustments to the recipie as you like it and create your own version â€¦
entry.content: Well, its a basic recipie and any amateur cooks knows how to make it in their own way. Here I am sharing my own ways and some tricks, the way I like it. You can make the adjustments to the recipie as you like it and create your own version.
